extension.summary: Spotify for Kodi with consistent art, metadata, and background loading (Kodi Connect style)
extension.description: Unofficial Spotify music plugin for Kodi. Improves on the original Spotify addon with consistent album/artist art in all views (including playlists), correct metadata tags, and background loading so navigation and playback feel smooth. Requires Spotify Premium.
extension.disclaimer: This product uses the SPOTIFY WEB API but is not endorsed, certified or otherwise approved in any way by Spotify. Spotify is the registered trademark of Spotify AB.
extension.news: v1.0.0 - Fork of plugin.audio.spotify with Kodi Connect–style improvements. - Spotify playlists as real Kodi playlists: synced to Music → Playlists as .m3u files (like PlexKodiConnect), not addon folders. - Spotify Connect receiver (LibreSpot): optional integration so you can stream/control from iPhone or other devices to Kodi (requires librespot binary). - Consistent art: thumb, poster, fanart, and icon set for albums, artists, playlists, and tracks so every list view shows art. - Correct metadata: proper Kodi music info types (year, duration, tracknumber, albumartist, etc.) for reliable tagging. - Background precache: library precache runs in a thread so the main menu appears immediately. - Smoother playlist play: first track starts quickly; remaining tracks are queued in the background.
